column1: Happy National Religious Freedom Day! We are truly blessed to live in a country that gives its citizens the freedom to worship as they please without fear of reprisal. https://t.co/IzxTX09Mja
Great announcement for American businesses and farmers! It took a big stick to get the Chinese to come to the table. Finally we get them to a level playing field. https://t.co/y04Mo4e7vR
The Iranian people have had enough of their terroristic and oppressive regime. THEY refuse to desecrate the American flag! https://t.co/1cGO0naip5
Please pray for our Marines as they are deployed to the Middle East. We host 1/3 of all active duty Marines in ENC. Thank God we have them on our side.https://t.co/DOLD7APPkK

What a treat this morning having breakfast with Dr Ben Carson a fellow surgeon and conservative. We talked about the future of our country and how we must stand up for the principles that our Founding Fathers used as the basis of creating the greatest nation on earth. https://t.co/VD1Vn9BD7b

My dear friend Father Rick Frechette who I met while doing medical relief work in Haiti after the devastating earthquake some 10 years ago talks about the daily struggles the Haitian people face. We are so lucky to live in America.https://t.co/g1QbYqHbLd
@volDddy @All435Reps They are murderers...how’s that?
Americans should stand tall with the Iranian people and not their terrorist leaders. The Iranian people need to topple their oppressive regime. https://t.co/iw9uRd23Pv
My heart goes out to the fisherman who died and two who are still missing this week when Papa’s Girl sank in the Pamlico Sound in high seas. Please pray for their families.
@truth_retail Perhaps if Soleimani has not orchestrated the embassy attack or all of the other attacks on America he would still be alive
Iran lies for three days about downing a commercial airliner killing hundreds of innocents including children. And we have Americans defending them.
Buttigieg’s tweet about ‘tit for tat’ with Iran was totally irresponsible. Linking the US with the fact that Iran killed hundreds of innocents is simply ridiculous

Tying a president's hands regardless of party in times like this is dangerous. I know that @realDonaldTrump will continue to balance our priorities of achieving peace and ensuring the safety of our military.  My full statement on the resolution below: https://t.co/IZz0ob8vDB
Thank you to the men and women in blue who risk so much to keep us safe. Thank you for all you do!! https://t.co/cStxo2gn96

Just attended a briefing by @SecPompeo and other high-ranking officials which reaffirmed that @realDonaldTrump made the right decision to take out Soleimani. We all look forward now to a de-escalation of the crisis and a pathway to peace and prosperity for the Iranian people.
Great meeting with the folks from TROSA today about opening a residential treatment place here in the east. Thank you Dr Perrin Jones for your leadership!
@akemor @GMMD4Greenville Not attacking my constituents at all. Am actually defending your right to disagree in a free world. I am not going anywhere.
Evil is present in this world and must be confronted. There are people in this country that hate this President more than they love this country or its people. So sad. So selfish.

The man responsible for 17% of Americans killed during the Iraq War has been given his due. Qassem Soleimani continued to plot future massacres until yesterday after @realDonaldTrump made the right call to eliminate him. The world is a better place because of it.
Happy New Year everyone!!Prayers for a Happy Healthy and Holy New Year! May God Bless our nation! https://t.co/KspZNwZebM

Congrats to Jacksonville native Christina Koch who recently set the record for the longest single spaceflight by a woman. Such a tremendous accomplishment for NC America and all of humanity! Well done Christina and safe travels back home!  https://t.co/XrdgwpmVhl

Need help with a federal agency? My office may be able to help resolve a problem or get you the information you need. To get started or learn more please click on the link below!  https://t.co/cR0vnSNMeh
Proud to have a 98% conservative score from Heritage Action for America! I’ll continue advocating for conservatism and eastern North Carolinians in 2020. https://t.co/UfwMbVIQqz
Merry Christmas!  Here's a message from my family to yours on this special day. https://t.co/mLGaZRHy1s

Telehealth is a vital resource for people who live in rural areas especially eastern NC. That's why @RepRichHudson and I sent a letter to CMS and HRSA today asking how they are working to expand access to telehealth for the 60 million Americans who live in rural America. https://t.co/9KcEvRsme1

The first newsletter is officially out! Follow the link below to read about my thoughts on the latest issues district highlights and even take an opinion poll about a potential solution to the high price of prescription drugs.  https://t.co/T5LRwSorsf https://t.co/ml8h6XMkRS
Just got back from the House floor and have some good news to report.  Watch to see why #USMCA is such a big deal for the state of North Carolina! https://t.co/T748sDtU4v

Congrats to my good friend and patriot @RepMarkMeadows on a stellar tenure in the House of Representatives. He has been an exceptional steward of his constituents in western North Carolina and steadfast defender of freedom liberty and American values.
Give me a break. Pelosi puts this nation through hell for two months and is now afraid of the real facts that will come out in the Senate. She and Schiff have lied to America
You have served him and your district well!! https://t.co/gbr8cd7nA1

I just delivered a speech on the House floor voicing my disappointment in the unprecedented baseless and partisan impeachment of President Donald Trump.  Here's a video of my speech: https://t.co/bewH4uEnem
I'll be speaking on the House floor against #Impeachment shortly. Tune in to Fox News or C-SPAN to watch my remarks.
The only bipartisan vote today will be a vote AGAINST impeachment.

Today is #WrightBrothersDay! I take great pride in representing #NC03 which 116 years ago on this date was home to the first human powered and controlled flight. Earlier this year I visited @WrightBrosNPS which is where the Wright Brothers made their historic #FirstInFlight https://t.co/tJKOHMIg60
It’s an incredible honor to be an advocate for the thousands of Marines who are stationed in eastern North Carolina.

Congress finally funded the military and our brave troops will receive a pay increase. This year's #NDAA also provides $5.3 billion for military installations damaged by natural disasters which includes @camp_lejeune.

On December 7th 1941 our country was changed forever after Japan attacked Pearl Harbor. May we never forget the sacrifices made by those in uniform and always keep our dedicated service members in our thoughts and prayers.
Be sure to #ShopSmall today at one of the many small businesses in eastern NC! https://t.co/cX6lc7spy4

Glad Wendy and I had the opportunity to meet and thank the Marines today on Thanksgiving at the Jacksonville USO. It was an honor to show our appreciation for those who sacrifice so much for us on a daily basis. https://t.co/Zjjyw7qoRc

Regardless of your political or religious beliefs Thanksgiving is the perfect time for us all to come together in thanks for the many blessings in our lives. Hope everyone enjoys some great food and quality time with family and friends today. Happy Thanksgiving!

Thanks to @DailySignal and @LRacheldG for hosting me on their podcast! We talked about healthcare Veterans Day and the beautiful shores of eastern North Carolina. My interview runs from 10:18-23:39 click on the link below to check it out!  https://t.co/xtekyoa8c4

Two hundred thirty years ago today North Carolina ratified the Constitution and joined the union. Since then the Constitution has proven to be the greatest governing document ever written for the purpose of securing liberty. Happy Birthday North Carolina!

During visits to military bases in eastern NC I’ve learned how badly stop gap funding hurts our military which is why I voted against today’s Continuing Resolution. For the sake of our military we must come together and fund the government long term.  https://t.co/Fa7EBwx9ip
Instead of wasting more taxpayer time and money we should be voting to fund our military lower drug costs and finalize trade deals.
We didn't learn anything new in the impeachment hearing. The transcript is public. The facts are clear. There was no conditionality and there was no abuse of power.

Congressman Jones was not only my predecessor but also a friend and mentor. Yesterday I introduced my first piece of legislation as a Member of Congress in his honor. Please watch my remarks from the House floor in support of it: https://t.co/oDTLX6DOoT

On this Veterans Day we honor the men and women who have put themselves in harm's way so that we can enjoy freedom. Thank you to those who have dedicated a part of their life to defending this great nation especially the many veterans living in eastern North Carolina. https://t.co/xKgW3sU8un

I am so proud of the active duty reserve and veteran Marines that I have the honor to represent in eastern North Carolina. Thank you for your service and sacrifice semper fi and happy 244th birthday @USMC!

It was an honor visiting @USCG Base Elizabeth City for the first time in my official capacity as a Member of Congress. Thank you to the men and women on base who helped facilitate the visit and serve our country daily by keeping America’s shores safe. https://t.co/NCs4Gqs0rC
I am confident that justice will ultimately prevail and I will continue to oppose this baseless investigation until it does.

I voted against the resolution that unfortunately passed the House of Representatives today which simply codifies the unfair and unprecedented process that has been used to smear the President of the United States in an attempt to reverse the 2016 election.
Today marks a sad day in the history of our great republic.

Former Senator Kay Hagan was a dedicated steward to all North Carolinians. My thoughts and prayers are with her family and loved ones as we all mourn her passing and celebrate the many accomplishments she made throughout her life.
The service I attended today was a great memorial to a dedicated public servant. My prayers are with his family today as he rightly receives the great honor of lying in state.
Rep. Elijah Cummings’ service to our country transcended politics. It was with great sadness that I heard of his passing.

House Democrats without regard to facts have taken a guilty until proven innocent approach to impeachment. I'm disgusted by the unfair and unprecedented process through which they have conducted their Soviet-style investigation. Americans deserve transparency.
Thank you eastern NC farmers! #NationalFarmersDay https://t.co/uWNJWjIOyR
Congratulations @DrDixonECSU! I look forward to working with you. https://t.co/XaG3IHNIbP
@RightWingJewess @AdamSchiff I signed on as soon as @RepAndyBiggsAZ introduced.

I’m honored to represent thousands of men and women across eastern NC who defend our country. Thank you President @realDonaldTrump for your love of our military. I stand with you supporting these courageous patriots. https://t.co/ywDpM9wmid
Thankful for @RepMarkMeadows calling out this unfair process https://t.co/lj4cRiK7HF

Very impressed by the craftsmanship and quality product @JarrettBay - Thank you for showing me around and discussing the great economy! https://t.co/VZLl3glLDH
President @realDonaldTrump I met a big supporter of yours today as I toured @JarrettBay in Beaufort NC - we proudly stand with you in eastern North Carolina https://t.co/lxZUpAvjQQ
Great time with @HenryHinton1 and @Raefordshow963 on @1037WTIB on  this morning live from Beaufort. https://t.co/HwPcrMk0mE

Rep. Greg Murphy meeting with elected officials in the east today  https://t.co/lrcdkV95vm

Thank you @Franklin_Graham for proclaiming the good news of the Gospel - it was an honor to spend time with you this evening. May God continue to bless you and your ministry. #DecisionAmerica https://t.co/FMnFCH3ssp
“I am fully supportive of our President ⁦@realDonaldTrump⁩ and he’s really doing a fantastic job.” - Congressman Greg Murphy MD  https://t.co/MNDoY1Uio3
Great round table discussion this afternoon with business and political leaders in downtown Jacksonville. https://t.co/agmN3fmYqw
Congratulations to my friend Randy Ramsey on his election as Chairman of the UNC Board of Governors. @UNC_System https://t.co/Nio4r1IuQx
Congratulations Dr. Perrin Jones who was sworn in this morning replacing me in the NC House of Representatives- it was an honor to be with you this morning #NCGA https://t.co/3loTWk2DSH

Thank you Rob Hill and all the folks at Tull Hill Farms in Kinston for showing me your farm and discussing the needs of farmers. North Carolina is #1 producing state of sweet potatoes since 1971. 🍠 🚜 https://t.co/7wGWPE7t8t
Great discussion this morning with constituents in Lenoir County. Thank you Lovick’s Cafe for the great breakfast! 🍳🥞 https://t.co/xueknnNMug
We have a crisis at the #border and it must be addressed. Thank you ⁦@realDonaldTrump⁩ for being willing to address it- I stand with you! #BorderCrisis  https://t.co/C8uJxooTgQ

In Washington D.C. today setting up operations to get started serving the people of NC-03. What an honor. Let's get to work!
